meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inexplicable.
meanings.sent1: The inexplicablenesses of the universe leave us in awe.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are puzzled by the inexplicablenesses of some phenomena.
meanings.sent3: The children found the inexplicablenesses of magic tricks amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her smile held an inexplicablenesses that brightened the room.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the inexplicablenesses of emotions in his painting.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed various inexplicablenesses from ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent2: She collected stories of inexplicablenesses from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The cat's inexplicablenesses in knocking things off the table made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The forest was full of inexplicablenesses waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The book was filled with inexplicablenesses that kept the readers intrigued.
